```json
{
  "paper_metadata": {
    "title": "Impact Assessment of the Tingathe Economic Empowerment Pilot Project (EEP) in Malawi",
    "matches_expected_title": "NO"
  },
  "program_information": {
    "program_name": "Tingathe Economic Empowerment Pilot Project (EEP)",
    "country": "Malawi",
    "region": "Mwanza district and Neno district",
    "target_population": "Ultra-poor and labour-constrained households"
  },
  "intervention_components": {
    "component_a_cash_support": {
      "component_a_present": true,
      "cash_support_type": "lump-sum transfer",
      "cash_amount": "MWK 50,000 (about USD 50)",
      "cash_frequency": "one-time",
      "is_loan_or_credit": "NO",
      "cash_evidence_citation": "In detail: a) two randomly selected clusters receive a lump-sum transfer (MWK 50,000, or about USD 50);"
    },
    "component_b_assets": {
      "component_b_present": false,
      "assets_provided": [],
      "direct_provision": "NO",
      "assets_evidence_citation": "No mention of direct provision of assets; lump-sum transfer was used by beneficiaries to purchase livestock or other productive assets."
    }
  },
  "study_characteristics": {
    "outcomes_measured": [
      "financial literacy",
      "savings",
      "loans",
      "livestock ownership",
      "agricultural production",
      "non-farm business creation",
      "poverty reduction",
      "food security",
      "resilience to shocks"
    ],
    "outcomes_evidence_citation": "The quantitative analysis shows that the project had substantial positive impacts, in particular on financial literacy, savings, loans, livestock wealth, agricultural production, and resilience to drought. [...] The EEP also had significant impacts on the likelihood that new non-farm business activities were commenced, as well as on sales and profits in these activities. [...] Altogether, the impacts on productive outcomes such as livestock ownership and agricultural production are much larger in the lump-sum plus training group as compared to the lump-sum only group.",
    "study_design": "Cluster-randomized controlled trial (RCT)",
    "design_evidence_citation": "The impact assessment for the Economic Empowerment Pilot Project was carried out with an experimental study design, using longitudinal information. [...] The quantitative survey design consists of a cluster-randomised control trial using the targeting registry of the Social Cash Transfer Programme as a baseline survey.",
    "is_review_or_policy_analysis": false,
    "publication_year": null,
    "study_conducted_year": "2014-2017",
    "sample_size": 800,
    "completed": true
  },
  "bonus_information": {
    "has_qualitative_components": true,
    "qualitative_methods": ["semi-structured household questionnaire", "in-depth interviews", "focus group discussions"],
    "qualitative_evidence_citation": "The qualitative survey consists of a longitudinal study of 30 treatment households using a semi-structured household questionnaire. The in-depth interviews with these households were conducted one, three and ten weeks after the lump-sum payment. Furthermore, we arranged meetings with all 10 VSL groups that had been formed as a result of the training. During these meetings, we gathered information through focus group discussions.",
    "has_cost_data": false,
    "cost_mentions": null,
    "cost_evidence_citation": null
  },
  "evidence_citations": {
    "program_name_citation": "The main objective of the Tingathe Economic Empowerment Pilot Project (EEP) was to put beneficiaries onto a 'graduation pathway', that is, to provide them with the necessary resources to significantly improve their well-being and lay the foundation for an exit from poverty and dependence on social assistance in the mid-to long term.",
    "country_citation": "The main objective of the Tingathe Economic Empowerment Pilot Project (EEP) was to put beneficiaries onto a 'graduation pathway', that is, to provide them with the necessary resources to significantly improve their well-being and lay the foundation for an exit from poverty and dependence on social assistance in the mid-to long term.",
    "target_population_citation": "Unlike the other programmes presented, that target potential entrepreneurs and business owners with labour capacities, the EEP targets ultra-poor households that are supposed to have strong labour impediments (high dependency ratio)."
  }
}
```
